text: he imandarasakala! Tomaloke yetiya gopane paraamarsa karaiba tetiya yate tomaloke gunaha, simalanghana arau raachulara biraud'dhacarana samparke gopana paraamarsa nakaraa. Arau tomaloke satkarma arau takbaraa aralambanara bisaye gopana paraamarsa karaa, lagate allahaka bhaya karaa, yara ocarata tomalokaka samabeta karaa haâ€™ba
